backfill_options.description:
By default, energy data is backfilled from the start of your current billing cycle. You can optionally load 365 days of historical data.

NOTE: You will not be able to change your decision to do an extended backfill later unless you delete and re-add the integration

recalculate_history.title: Recalculate Historic Costs?
recalculate_history.description:
Your cost calculation method is changing from **{old_mode}** to **{new_mode}**.

Existing cost statistics were calculated using the old method. Would you like to recalculate historic cost records to use the new method?

NOTE:
- If changing to a rate schedule, cost calculation may not be completely accurate as billing cycles must be estimated
- Cost calculation will be limited to the effective date of the new rate schedule

data_description.recalculate_history: If enabled, you will be asked to choose a date range for the recalculation
